scripts.watch_mac: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.watch_windows: npm run client | npm run server
scripts.installs: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.deploy: npm run build_mac --prefix client && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build_win --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
